statements: SELECT gene_id, gene_name, sequence FROM gene_sequences
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM gene_sequences WHERE gene_id = 1
SELECT * FROM gene_sequences WHERE gene_name LIKE 'ABC%'
SELECT * FROM gene_sequences LIMIT 5
SELECT gene_name, sequence FROM gene_sequences ORDER BY gene_name DESC
SELECT * FROM gene_sequences WHERE gene_id > 100 ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT gene_name, LENGTH(sequence) AS sequence_length FROM gene_sequences WHERE LENGTH(sequence) > 50;
SELECT gene_name, CONCAT('Gene ID: ', gene_id) AS gene_info FROM gene_sequences WHERE gene_id BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT gene_name, SUBSTRING(sequence, 1, 10) AS sequence_start FROM gene_sequences WHERE sequence LIKE '%ATG%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_gene_sequences FROM gene_sequences;
SELECT * FROM genes;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM genes ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, gene_sequence FROM genes WHERE gene_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, gene_sequence FROM genes WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM sequences ORDER BY gene_id ASC;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, gene_sequence FROM genes WHERE gene_id = 'abcd-1234'
SELECT * FROM genes WHERE gene_name LIKE '%car%' ORDER BY gene_id DESC
SELECT sequences.* FROM sequences JOIN genes ON sequences.gene_id = genes.gene_id WHERE gene_name = 'Mycoprotein'
SELECT gene_name, COUNT(sequence_id) AS num_sequences FROM genes LEFT JOIN sequences ON genes.gene_id = sequences.gene_id GROUP BY gene_name HAVING num_sequences > 5
SELECT DISTINCT gene_name, gene_sequence FROM genes ORDER BY gene_name
SELECT * FROM GeneSequences;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM GeneSequences ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT gene_name, sequence FROM GeneSequences WHERE gene_id = 2;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result FROM SequenceAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_id ASC;

SELECT gene_name, analysis_result, comparison_result FROM GeneSequences INNER JOIN SequenceAnalysis ON GeneSequences.gene_id = SequenceAnalysis.gene_id INNER JOIN ComparisonResults ON SequenceAnalysis.analysis_id = ComparisonResults.analysis_id;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, sequence FROM GeneSequences LIMIT 10
SELECT gene_name, sequence FROM GeneSequences ORDER BY gene_name ASC
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, sequence FROM GeneSequences WHERE gene_id = 5
SELECT analysis_result, gene_name FROM GeneSequences JOIN SequenceAnalysis ON GeneSequences.gene_id = SequenceAnalysis.gene_id
SELECT * FROM SequenceAnalysis JOIN ComparisonResults ON SequenceAnalysis.analysis_id = ComparisonResults.analysis_id
SELECT * FROM GeneSequences;
SELECT gene_name, sequence FROM GeneSequences ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT gene1_id, gene2_id, comparison_result FROM GeneComparisons WHERE comparison_result = 'Similar';
SELECT gene_id, description FROM GeneMetadata WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT gene_name, sequence FROM GeneSequences WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT gene_name, sequence FROM GeneSequences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, sequence FROM GeneSequences ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT gene1_id, gene2_id, comparison_result FROM GeneComparisons WHERE gene1_id = 2 AND gene2_id = 3;
SELECT analysis_name, result FROM AnalysisResults WHERE result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT gene_id, description FROM GeneMetadata ORDER BY description ASC;
SELECT * FROM genes;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM genes WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, gene_sequence FROM genes ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM comparisons WHERE similarity_score > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM genes;
SELECT gene_name FROM genes ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT sequence_text FROM sequences WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM comparisons WHERE similarity_score > 0.8 ORDER BY similarity_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_description, timestamp FROM logs WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
